entry.title: An Oracle Of Roses
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,668Chapters: 5/17Kudos: 273

Summary: Arthur Pendragon, Prince Regent of the Albion Empire, always feared he would face an arranged marriage. Now, as he desperately struggles to restore magic in the hopes of saving his sister, the answer is obvious. He must marry Lord Emrys, the scion of a noble, magical line. Both men know their duty. Their union would bring all Albion back into balance, but the world is not a simple place, and neither of them make a good first impression. Will they be able to overcome their doubts, or is their match doomed to fail?

entry.title: Words I'll never speak, speeches you'll never read
entry.summary:
Author: thelastpendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,365Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: It was the evening of Samhain and, like always, Arthur read over the speech Merlin had written for him before the feast. Only this time, his words almost moved him to tears. He knew Merlin was a gifted writer, but this was something else. This was personal. And so devastating that anyone who read it may think the author of such speech had undergone the deepest tragedy. And he couldn't help but wonder... Just how much grief was Merlin carrying behind that cheeky smile? Or: what their dynamic could've been in S5 if Arthur was just a bit more perceptive and less emotionally constipated.

entry.title: To Avalon
entry.summary:
Author: FizarolliSparks248

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,817Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Arthur had been sent out on a quest, on his way home he accidentally takes a turn in the fae wilds, he knows the rules - Don't Reveal Your Name - Do not step in Mushroom Rings - Do not trample Fae Mounds - Don't eat fae food That last one, Arthur and his steed had not eaten in days, it was hard to tell what was and wasn't enchanted food but he needed to eat something or they'd both starve. Unfortunately Arthur was caught by the Fae Emerys My obligatory celebration of writing for a month felt like a bit of Merarthur for a change. As usual got carried away almost finished but will upload as an when for pacing

entry.title: Would You Protect Me
entry.summary:
Author: Noel803

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,588Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 87

Summary: A war rages between Camelot and the magical kingdom of Avalon. King Uther and King Balinor’s armies have been trapped in a stalemate for the last three years. However, King Uther suspects that the war is about to tip into his favor, now that he has kidnapped Avalon’s young prince. Little does he know that fate has a different plan and that his own son may be the undoing of his vicious plot. Prince Arthur, barely a dozen summers old, watches as his father locks a young boy in the highest tower of Camelot. Curiosity draws him in, but it’s Merlin that keeps drawing him back. He quickly learns that the war is not what his father told him, and he must make his own choice to protect his kingdom or the innocent.

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 266,583Chapters: 58/100Kudos: 2,781

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: A Legend that Begins With a Crush
entry.summary:
Author: Clearwater96

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,719,934Chapters: 111/?Kudos: 1,509

Summary: Arthur Pendragon and Merlin were literally from two different worlds. One is a prince from a great kingdom and the other a common farm boy from the next kingdom over. These two should have never met.But that was before they realized their parents were once friends and arranged the two of them to marry when they reached adulthood. That was before Uther turned on magic and Hunith went on the run with her infant son.Now, twenty years have passed and the Prince, Arthur Pendragon is far out of his depth. After four months of marriage and learning what he has about Merlin, he knows that things need to change, but doesn’t know what can be done.And with every attempt at trying going wrong, with mysterious boys showing up wanting to be a knight, strange physician’s trying to coerce his consort away, even stranger ladies who’ve seen to weaken Arthur’s brain, and the arrival of an odd Druid boy they need to risk it all just to get to safety…will Arthur ever get things to go right?

entry.title: is it all we've ever been?
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,673Chapters: 9/10Kudos: 28

Summary: And, at the very center of Merlin’s attention, was the one who must be his soulmate, the very cause of this color. This was the moment he had been waiting for. Arthur would choose him, he had to. There was no universe where he wouldn’t fall for Merlin. It was inevitable; they fit together too perfectly for it to end any other way. But, god, he wanted it so badly.Or; Merlin longs to be with Arthur, his soulmate, so desperately that he’d do anything to stay in his life. But Arthur already has a soulmate, and the thought consumes Merlin, haunting him with the cruel truth that he was too late for the one love that was meant to be his.

entry.title: That Which Cannot Die
entry.summary:
Author: IIALFAII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,923Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 235

Summary: When Merlin is lost to Arthur in a way he cannot cope with, the prince is left shattered—adrift in a world colder and lonelier than he ever imagined. But grief is only the beginning. When Merlin returns, unchanged and without memory of being gone, or why, Arthur confronts a truth he never expected: Merlin is his soulmate, the missing piece that makes him whole. As their bond rekindles and deepens, Arthur will fight against all odds to protect the man he cannot live without. Together, they must navigate secrets, danger, and their own hearts—discovering that love can rise from even the darkest of tragedies, and that some souls are destined to be forever entwined.

entry.title: Dear Mr. Uther Pendragon
entry.summary:
Author: gloriask

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,209Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 1,038

Summary: After a heated argument with his son three years ago, Arthur left home, and Uther hadn’t spoken a single word to him since. That is, until he started receiving some rather peculiar emails.   Now has Merlin's pov. Completed. Updated: Extra Track 1 - Love Confession Extra Track 2 - Sentimental

entry.title: oh, my good looking boy.
entry.summary:
Author: terabyte_archived

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,504Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: merlin panted softly to himself as he took a seat on the end of the bed, he’d just finished putting his pajamas on and was already out of breath. his back was sore and his ankles were swollen, while his belly was huge and round with the heir. “-and i told gwaine that if he believed he could outrun me, he was a fool.” arthur laughed low and throaty as he slid off his boots, having just come into their bedroom from a meeting with his knights. “well, you’re all quite thick.” merlin hummed, steadying his breathing as he rubbed his belly. he was dressed in a simple gown as he slid into bed, holding onto his back as he stretched and laid down. he cleared his throat in an attempt to hide his labored breathing, tiring himself out from being so heavily pregnant. or merlin is pregnant(magically. GASP. i know.)
